name: modrinth-bot
description: Search Modrinth for projects and get notified when a project gets updated.

scripts.deploy: node build/deploy-commands.js | pino-pretty -i pid,hostname -t yyyy-mm-dd HH:MM:ss
scripts.global-deploy: node global-deploy-commands.js | pino-pretty -i pid,hostname -t yyyy-mm-dd HH:MM:ss
scripts.dbInit: node dbInit.js | pino-pretty -i pid,hostname -t yyyy-mm-dd HH:MM:ss
scripts.dbReset: node dbInit.js -f | pino-pretty -i pid,hostname -t yyyy-mm-dd HH:MM:ss

author: Lily & Aubrey
